name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil spaghetti. Fry bacon. Mix eggs and parmesan. Combine everything.

name: Beef Stir Fry
instructions: Stir fry beef. Add veggies and sauce. Serve with rice.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cook chicken in curry powder. Add onion, garlic, tomato, and rice. Serve with rice.

name: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Grill salmon with lemon, garlic, salt, and pepper.

name: Vegetable Pizza
instructions: Spread pizza dough. Add tomatoes, onion, bell peppers, mushrooms, and olive oil. Bake at 450Â°F for 15 minutes.

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Add chicken and Alfredo sauce. Serve with parmesan and garlic.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef. Add lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheese to tortillas. Serve with salsa.
